name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
instructions: 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 2. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. 3. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, lemon juice, and chopped dill. 4. Drizzle the lemon butter over the grilled salmon fillets and garnish with lemon slices. Serve immediately.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness. 2. Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough. 3. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce. 4. Arrange the fresh basil leaves over the cheese. 5. Drizzle olive oil over the pizza and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. 6. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly. Serve hot.

name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
instructions: 1. Scoop the flesh of the avocados into a blender or food processor. 2. Add the cocoa powder, honey or maple syrup, almond milk, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt. 3. Blend until smooth and creamy. 4. Spoon the mousse into serving dishes and chill in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour before serving. 5. Garnish with fresh berries. Enjoy!

name: Thai Green Curry with Vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: 1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until translucent. 2. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger, cooking for another minute. 3. Stir in the green curry paste and cook for 2 minutes until fragrant. 4. Pour in the coconut milk and vegetable broth, bringing the mixture to a simmer. 5. Add the mixed vegetables and tofu, cooking for 10-15 minutes until the vegetables are tender. 6. Stir in the soy sauce and brown sugar. Adjust seasoning as needed. 7. Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve with lime wedges.

name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
instructions: 1. Place the banana, blueberries, Greek yogurt, almond milk, honey, and chia seeds in a blender. 2. Blend until smooth and creamy. 3. Pour the smoothie into glasses and garnish with fresh mint. Serve immediately.
